product_name: Moving Comfort Jubralee Sports Bra - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Moving Comfort Jubralee sports bra uses high-performance fabrics and sophisticated construction to offer comfortable support for high-impact activity. Soft polyester/spandex fabric wicks moisture away from skin. Seam-free interior cups increase comfort, enhance shaping with a slight contour and offer a bit of modesty. Built-in support on sides and under bust minimizes up-and-down and side-to-side motion. Front straps adjust using a concealed rip-and-stick closure; it's very easy to adjust the Jubralee while wearing it. Bonded straps reduce chafing. Rear closure features soft padding and 3 hook-and-eye loops to adjust the fit. Closeout.
short_description: The Moving Comfort Jubralee sports bra uses high-performance fabrics and sophisticated construction to offer comfortable support for high-impact activity.
